name: Jokinen Finland
description:
American Apparel Heather Lake Blue 50/50 tee

Royal/White Finnish front
White Jokinen back logo and number

Juicy J won a silver medal with the Fins back in 06. Will he be upgrading to gold in 2014? 

We're big on the funny characters on the foreign shirts, so we were bummed when we found out Jokinen is the same in Finnish as it is in English. Atleast Maatta has those A-dot things going on. Oh well, they can't all be winners. 

I wasn't sold on Jokinen at first but he has been a pleasant surprise on Malkin's wing. We were at that Canes game when he put a hat trick on his former team...didn't throw my hat...I blew it. I should have offered my hat as a sign of friendship and earned respect. 

I love him now like I loved Fedetenko...They might be the same guy.

These American Apparel tees are super soft, but they run a little slim. The model is 5'9" with a BMI slightly in the overweight range but he swears it doesn't account for muscle mass. He is wearing a Large. If you buy a tee and it doesn't fit, send it back and we'll get you the right size.

name: Geno Russia
description:
American Apparel Heather Red 50/50 tee

Royal and Luster Gold front
Soft White back logo

I'm Score for Mother Russia.

I'm play with Ovi but he sucks.
I'm play with Kovalchuk, he couldn't hack it in the NHL. He stole my number for Russia, he's a bitch.
I'm miss Gonchar.

These American Apparel tees are super soft, but they run a little slim. The model is 5'9" with a BMI slightly in the overweight range but he swears it doesn't account for muscle mass. He is wearing a Large. If you buy a tee and it doesn't fit, send it back and we'll get you the right size.

name: Maatta Finland
description:
American Apparel Heather Lake Blue 50/50 tee

Royal/White SUOMI (Finland) front
White Maatta back logo and number 3

Olli Maatta~ the baby faced killer. We're not sure if he'll be representing Finland in the Olympics this year but his time will surely come and when it does, you'll be ready. Of course he probably won't be wearing number 3, the number thing doesn't always work out with the international play. Who cares, he wears 3 for the Pens and that's all that really matters. 

These American Apparel tees are super soft, but they run a little slim. The model is 5'9" with a BMI slightly in the overweight range but he swears it doesn't account for muscle mass. He is wearing a Large. If you buy a tee and it doesn't fit, send it back and we'll get you the right size.

name: Bang Letang Marry Scuderi
description:
Next Level Women's Cut Tri-Blend Heather Black Tee (50% polyester, 25% rayon, 25% cotton)

Soft gold full front logo

Ladies love Letang, he's a rebel, he plays with an edge, he's smooth on the ice which probably translates to the bedroom, he's got an accent, he's got sex hair... everything you think you want in a man when you're between the ages of 16 to 24 and probably again when your 40+. 
    It's fun for a while, but at some point your needs change. You start looking to settle down, you want some stability, some security, you want to wife up a D-man who's gonna stay at home and put his life on the line to protect your crease. That's when you realize Scuderi has been there all along. You thought this was just a dumb shirt...ponder that social commentary. Did I just blow your mind.

These Next Level tees are super soft, but they run a little slim. The model is 5'1 and was once called "Thick" by a black man in the Southside which she took as a great compliment. She is wearing a Medium. If you buy a tee and it doesn't fit, send it back and we'll get you the right size.

name: Defense Heather Gold
description:
American Apparel Heather Gold 50/50 tee

Soft Black front logo

Letang, Orpik, Martin, Scuderi, Niskanen, Bortuzzo, Maatta, the gangs all there. It hurt my heart not to include Engo on our Defense tee this year, but as far as we're concerned he's a forward...and he's killing it. 

Pumped to have Scuderi back on our blueline....hopefully he's The Piece we've been missing in the playoffs the last few years. This is the same description I used for the Heather Black version which is a lame move.

These American Apparel tees are super soft, but they run a little slim. The model is 5'1 and was once called "Thick" by a black man in the Southside which she took as a great compliment. She is wearing an XS. If you buy a tee and it doesn't fit, send it back and we'll get you the right size.

name: Defense Heather Black
description:
American Apparel Heather Black 50/50 Tee

Soft Gold full front logo

Letang, Orpik, Martin, Scuderi, Niskanen, Bortuzzo, Maatta, the gangs all there. It hurt my heart not to include Engo on our Defense tee this year, but as far as we're concerned he's a forward...and he's killing it. 

Pumped to have Scuderi back on our blueline....hopefully he's The Piece we've been missing in the playoffs the last few years.

These American Apparel tees are super soft, but they run a little slim. The model is 5'9" with a BMI slightly in the overweight range but he swears it doesn't account for muscle mass. He is wearing a Large. If you buy a tee and it doesn't fit, send it back and we'll get you the right size.

name: Malkins Militia Baseball Tee
description:
American Apparel White and Black 50/50 Raglan Baseball Tee

Soft Black/Soft Luster Gold front logo

Malkin's Militia version 4.0 on a baseball tee. If you have body temperature issues in Consol, this tee will cover 6 more inches on each arm keepin those elbows nice and toasty. 

These American Apparel tees are nice and soft, but they run a little slim. The model is 5'9" with a BMI slightly in the overweight range but he swears it doesn't account for muscle mass. He is wearing a Large. If you buy a tee and it doesn't fit, send it back and we'll get you the right size.

name: Malkin's Militia Premium Heather
description:
Next Level Tri-Blend Premium Heather Tee

Dull Black/Dull Luster Gold full front logo

Malkin's Militia 4.0... A standard on our site over the years, this is by far the best Malkin's Militia logo to date.

Fact~ I was wearing a Malkin's Militia 1.0 tee under my Crosby jersey during game 7 of the 2009 Stanley Cup. So that means version 1.0 was rad...and 2.0 and 3.0 didn't win sh** so if you own those, throw them out. 

These Next Level tees are super soft, but they run a little slim. The model is 5'9" with a BMI slightly in the overweight range but he swears it doesn't account for muscle mass. He is wearing a Large. If you buy a tee and it doesn't fit, send it back and we'll get you the right size.

name: Battlin Buccos
description:
Soft Black print on Heather Gold American Apparel 50/50 tees.

- Battlin' Buccos front and back art done by awesome illustrator, cartoonist, and Pittsburgh sports fan Robert Ullman ~ www.atombombbikini.net ~  follow him on twitter, check out everythin he's ever done cause it's all good stuff.  

- The Buccos have been battlin' since 1887. For the last 20 years they've done about as well as Custer at Little Big Horn. Celebrate the end of two decades of agony by buying this tee for you and six of your closest friends. 

#Buctober Apparel

- American Apparel 50/50 tees are kind of slim fit...if you're in a fat stage of your life, maybe buy 1 size bigger, or buy your size and don't ever wash it, or maybe buy your size and it'll fit perfect. When people ask how they fit, I tell them I don't know. I don't sew the shirts myself, they all fit a little different, but if you mail it back, I will send you the right size, but try not to get deodorant stains on it. Don't wear deodorant

name: Raise The Jolly Roger
description:
Soft Gold print on Heather Black American Apparel 50/50 tees

- What can you say about the Buccos. How many more years? HOW MANY MORE YEARS? I've been around, i've been to games, there I am in the upper deck, wearing this shirt...praying for a fat Parrot to run onto a baseball field and wave around a pirate flag. It sounds insane, it's insane that i'll never give up.

- American Apparel 50/50 tees are kind of slim fit...if you're in a fat stage of your life, maybe buy 1 size bigger, or buy your size and don't ever wash it, or maybe buy your size and it'll fit perfect. name: Womyn's Heart PGH Maniac Sweatshirt
description:
Gold Heart PGH Print on Eco Black Alternative Apparel Ladies' Maniac Sweatshirt

 30's 50% polyester (6.25% recycled), 46% cotton (6.25% organic), 4% rayon

 Low-impact yarn-dyed and fabric-washed
 Regular fit
 Raw-edge, off-the-shoulder neckline
 Front kangaroo pocket (some come with a joey inside)

This sweatshirts runs a bit small. Mee$ says if you wear a small in the men's american apparel 50/50 tee and you're curvy you should go with a medium on this. If you're emo small though, you would still want to stay with the small in this. Does that make sense? 

They all fit a little different, but if you mail it back, I will send you the right size, but try not to get deodorant stains on it. Don't wear deodorant. Shipping is 4 bones on these cause they have a little mass to them.
